thread.title: A Relaxing Wonderful Place
thread.title_full: A Relaxing Wonderful Place - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Whael G
title: A Relaxing Wonderful Place
text:
This hotel is located in the wonderful Westminster Park of the Great London, it is one minute from the wonderful London Eye, London Dungeon, Dream Works, and Westminster Bridge. I was staying with my family in December 2017 and we had a nice tour and its garden. Then, in March 2017, I had nice and relaxing tea cup in its neatly designed lobby.
Room Tip: Better to have a look on the many types of rooms they got .. See more room tips
